column5: Cliff and Bly's???????????Photo ZZZZZZZZZZZ  Whats wrong Glen you can't sleep?

Great...... an impatient redneck and he still has 5 more days to go. Why don't you go get a sack of crawfish and trim their toenails???? or see how long you can make a possum play possum before he gets up and leaves???? that should keep him busy for awhile.   Art
Deep fried in beer batter, or stir fried in olive oil and garlic, garnished with mint???
And don't forget the TABASCO.  Man, you guys are wild.  Let's see how they do tonight.  I wonder if carp like tabasco.
...It,s Glen,s special receipe??  Grannie,s favorite either one beware  Glen,you that antsy you thinking of not going?  Steve

Glen I refuse to say that word Pikeral ,we call them dore(dor eh) here .I have caught a few genuine chain pickeral ,perty fish.So bring some gear for Dore and alot of gents will say huh(thats US)and some will say EH  Just catch some fish Glen and keep the shirt on  MTP
Dont worry Dawg we got a few extra lures iffnn you need em.  When you boil them Crawfish add a few lemons and a few cloves of garlic. That boiled Garlic is out of this world good eatten.   Art
